howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central
and  North-western  provinces  and  in  Galle  and Matara districts  after 2.00 p.m.  Fairly heavy
showers  above  75  mm  can  be  expected  at  some  places  in  Western  and  Sabaragamuwa
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.
Several spells of showers may occur in Eastern and Uva provinces and in Hambanthota district.

M
isty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, Uva and
North-central provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the morning.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
